title: SmartGold01
author: SmartGold01
content: Although I been no wan raise this issues but I really need to address am because if one finger touches oil it surely affects all. Wetin I wan yan be say our person go make comments and him or she no too understand the discussion wey dey go on there before commenting. Like this e don go raise small dust but as na me create topic I quickly go lock am make e no too raise dust based on say them say how come Sinbad.io dey pay such person for the kind of post wey in dey Make.The thing is I no wan see say them ban person account for either spamming or plagiarism, abeg make we try to dey avoid post wey we no get anything meaningful to talk there, even me wey reach this level dey avoid some post wey me no sabi make e no put me trouble one day. Imagine how hard e dey for person to rank up no be wetin you go come post something wey no dey in line with the discussion for board. This matter no be only one person get this talk but na for everybody yes because we go think we sabi everything, e get wetin you go talk put yourself for inside trouble wey you no fit escape am..Make una read here to see wetin I dey yanhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5468695.msg62926542#msg62926542

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: SmartGold01 on October 01, 2023, 08:38:46 PMEdited outAside from threading the body of the post,  if you are not the first to comment on the thread,  you should endeavour to read the other people's comments on the thread if possible read all the comments unless those that are low quality off topics,  doing so will give you the background understanding and help you thought and memory to formulate your on comments. When they say effortless post,  what that simply means is that you did not put in any extra work to give the discussion your own views and rather you just ride on repetition of what others already said. I believe is easy to become a quality poster and the only way to do that is to read more than you write, sometimes separate the time for reading from the time for writing let say if you spend 10 hours in the forum and other online things,  you should allocate 6 hours into reading and let say the remaining 4 hours could go into writing,  that way you already have a mental integration with the various topics that are being discussed here in the forum.

comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on October 01, 2023, 09:25:15 PMQuote from: SmartGold01 on October 01, 2023, 08:38:46 PMEdited outyou should allocate 6 hours into reading and let say the remaining 4 hours could go into writing,  that way you already have a mental integration with the various topics that are being discussed here in the forum. Well this has been argued here sometimes ago where they are saying of one must not read everything to give their own judgement..Sincerely speaking this is what changes me because if I don't read I wouldn't know how to be creative in terms of creating my own topic and comments. Actually I wouldn't like to capitalized on this mistake rather everyone should learn their lesson from here to avoid some limitation from get accepted in most of the campaign or even sees us non quality posters.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: SmartGold01 on October 03, 2023, 07:09:47 AMQuote from: Wiwo on October 01, 2023, 09:25:15 PMQuote from: SmartGold01 on October 01, 2023, 08:38:46 PMEdited outyou should allocate 6 hours into reading and let say the remaining 4 hours could go into writing,  that way you already have a mental integration with the various topics that are being discussed here in the forum. Well this has been argued here sometimes ago where they are saying of one must not read everything to give their own judgement..Sincerely speaking this is what changes me because if I don't read I wouldn't know how to be creative in terms of creating my own topic and comments. Actually I wouldn't like to capitalized on this mistake rather everyone should learn their lesson from here to avoid some limitation from get accepted in most of the campaign or even sees us non quality posters.I believe we still have a few newbies or even other rank members who will find the comments and read them some days,  sincerely speaking there is no way you can be on topics without reading other members' contributions and sometimes what makes you a quality poster is your ability to bring something new to the discussions and the only way to bring a new content is to first of all know the old ones so you must read others comment,  it will help you mental alertness while constructing your own comments,  we should know better how and when to apply this when surfing through the forum. On the issue of campaign acceptance due to low-quality posts,  well I must say that our countrymen are doing well in the forum but few have assumed everything due to the number of merits being criteria for quality posting even though merits are significant factors being considered by managers but on the long run I don't think that will be sustainable and at that point, managers will have to rely more on the quality of posts,  and glad a lot of managers are changing this day with some even rating us every week which have helped us to improve a lot. But more still need to be done to improve the quality in here and the best possible and easy way is to engage more in reading while also writing because it becomes easy to write when you have something interesting to write about.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: This na the problem wey many people dey get, for them to take time read the OP, and people comments dey itch them for body, but how you won take contribute for such discussion when we no know wetin the discussion dey all about. E go make sense say the more we dey tey for the forum say make we dey improve ourselves everyday by day, by giving more of our time to reading and make we no come dey lazy because say we fon dey signature campaign. No be government work wey be say you don start and nothing fit commot you from the work only death. If the OP drop link on the topic, do well to read the link, and if other forum members wey comment drop link also go through the link, this go help you know or get many things to talk for your own comment. This forum work na to read be the only work because when you read, you go know many things and improve yourself wey be say if people dey read your comment, them go know say you dey grow and you dey add value.
